import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Sidebar({sidebarOpen}){ const [dropdownOpen, setDropdownOpen] = React.useState([]); const toggleDropdown = (index) => { setDropdownOpen((prevOpenDropdowns) => { const newOpenDropdowns = [...prevOpenDropdowns]; newOpenDropdowns[index] = !newOpenDropdowns[index]; return newOpenDropdowns; }); }; const dropdowns = [ { label: "Master Data", content:{1:{page:"Perawat", link:"/admin/perawat"}, 2:{page:"Pasien", link:"/admin/pasien"}}, icon: "M15 19.128a9.38 9.38 0 002.625.372 9.337 9.337 0 004.121-.952 4.125 4.125 0 00-7.533-2.493M15 19.128v-.003c0-1.113-.285-2.16-.786-3.07M15 19.128v.106A12.318 12.318 0 018.624 21c-2.331 0-4.512-.645-6.374-1.766l-.001-.109a6.375 6.375 0 0111.964-3.07M12 6.375a3.375 3.375 0 11-6.75 0 3.375 3.375 0 016.75 0zm8.25 2.25a2.625 2.625 0 11-5.25 0 2.625 2.625 0 015.25 0z" }, { label: "RTS & GCS", content:{1:{page:"Hitung RTS", link:"/admin/rts"}, 2:{page:"Hitung GCS", link:"/admin/gcs"}}, icon: "M15.75 15.75V18m-7.5-6.75h.008v.008H8.25v-.008zm0 2.25h.008v.008H8.25V13.5zm0 2.25h.008v.008H8.25v-.008zm0 2.25h.008v.008H8.25V18zm2.498-6.75h.007v.008h-.007v-.008zm0 2.25h.007v.008h-.007V13.5zm0 2.25h.007v.008h-.007v-.008zm0 2.25h.007v.008h-.007V18zm2.504-6.75h.008v.008h-.008v-.008zm0 2.25h.008v.008h-.008V13.5zm0 2.25h.008v.008h-.008v-.008zm0 2.25h.008v.008h-.008V18zm2.498-6.75h.008v.008h-.008v-.008zm0 2.25h.008v.008h-.008V13.5zM8.25 6h7.5v2.25h-7.5V6zM12 2.25c-1.892 0-3.758.11-5.593.322C5.307 2.7 4.5 3.65 4.5 4.757V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 002.25 2.25h10.5a2.25 2.25 0 002.25-2.25V4.757c0-1.108-.806-2.057-1.907-2.185A48.507 48.507 0 0012 2.25z"}, // Add more dropdowns if needed ]; return(

  • Dashboard
    • {dropdowns.map((dropdown, index) => (
  • {dropdownOpen[index] &&
    • {dropdown.content[1].page}

); } export default Sidebar;
